settings.title: The Synergy
settings.text: Skincare is an ecosystem. Using a brightening serum without a strong barrier allows hydration to escape. Using actives without SPF causes pigment to return. This is the complete biological loop.

settings.title: 2% Alpha Arbutin
settings.text: The Science: Binds to the tyrosinase enzyme, aggressively fading stubborn dark spots and post-acne marks (PIH) at the cellular source while Vitamin C boosts overall luminosity.

settings.title: Barrier Renew
settings.text: The Science: A 3:1:1 lipid matrix physically patches micro-tears in the stratum corneum. This locks the Arbutin deep into the skin, preventing evaporation and amplifying fading power.

settings.title: Matte UV Defense
settings.text: The Science: UV rays are the #1 trigger for melanin. This 6-filter hydrogel acts as an absolute shield, preventing the sun from undoing the hard work of your brightening serum.

settings.question: How do I layer these products?
settings.answer:
AM Routine: Cleanse -> Alpha Arbutin -> Barrier Renew -> SPF 50+.

PM Routine: Cleanse -> Alpha Arbutin -> Barrier Renew.

settings.question: Is this protocol safe for sensitive or acne-prone skin?
settings.answer: Yes. Every product in this protocol is 100% non-comedogenic (wont clog pores) and free from harsh bleaches or peeling acids. The Barrier Renew specifically heals the cellular inflammation that often triggers severe acne and sensitivity in the first place.

settings.question: How long will the Complete Protocol last?
settings.answer: With daily, consistent use as directed, the full protocol is designed to last exactly 45 to 60 days. This provides the perfect amount of time to undergo a complete cycle of epidermal cellular turnover and witness a massive visible transformation.
